## Using the REST API

## Content


### Deploy an item

- POST `/api/v0/upload`


### Schedule Tasks

- PATCH `/content/{ulid}/settings`
- GET `/api/v0/content/{ulid}/toml`
- GET `/api/v0/content/{ulid}/deployments`
- DELETE `/api/v0/admin/delete/{ulid} `

## Tasks


- PATCH `/content/{ulid}/schedule`
- POST `/api/v0/content/{ulid}/invoke`
- GET `/api/v0/content/{ulid}/invocations/active`
- POST `/api/v0/content/{ulid}/invocations/{id}/stop`

## Services

- GET `/api/v0/content/{ulid}/instances`
- POST `/api/v0/content/{ulid}/instances/{pid}/stop`

## User

- GET `/api/v0/user/items`
